# suspend()

**Instance Method**

Suspends the listener.

## Declaration

```swift
func suspend()
```

## Discussion

As you cannot invalidate a suspended listener, every call to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener/suspend()] that you make must be balanced by a call to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener/resume()].

## Managing connection state

- **activate()**: Activates the listener.
- **resume()**: Starts processing of incoming requests.
- **invalidate()**: Invalidates the listener.
